welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bradenton, where sunny beaches, quaint shops, and friendly locals await you. Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Bradenton has in store for you."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at SRQ serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at SRQ serves mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at SRQ serves mostly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whitted Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whitted Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Venice Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Venice Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
